channel.title: Off A Rail
channel.description: Just curious if anyone else has done the On A Rail chapter without actually ever using the tram for kicks. You need the tram to break down the concrete blocking the way out of Power Up, but after that point you can do it without ever using the tram.

item.title: Off A Rail
item.dc:creator: sersoft
item.description:
Gom _Jabbar:

And out of intrest dont you need the buggy to be parked in the garage for the combine assault on light house ?

And do you still see the dropship fly past with it on board or is it empty?

You can just jump down behind the lighthouse to get to the “secret exit” and skip the gunship fight entirely.

Ond kaja:

How did you get past the gate at New Little Odessa?

You don’t even have to get there, you climb the cliff and get on the road ahead.
